landing.title: KattBNB is coming soon!
landing.paragraph: Good things take time! But they are also worth the wait. We are working hard to get the best cat boarding site up and running. Stay tuned!

wip.message: This section is still a work in progress!

about.idea-p1: Cancelling a weekend trip because there is no one to look after your cat. Changing your plans because a friend who reluctantly agreed to pet sit bailed the last minute. Dragging your clearly disgruntled cat on a lengthy train ride because that’s the only way to visit your parents for Christmas. If you’re a cat owner, chances are that you’ve been there.
about.idea-p2: But what if booking your cat with a trusty petsitter would be as easy as booking yourself in a hotel or Airbnb? What if you wouldn’t have to worry about your furry friends wellbeing while you’re away on holiday?
about.idea-p3: We believe if things can be made less difficult, they should. And we believe problems are solved when people come together. That’s why we are building KattBNB - a platform where cat owners can meet cat sitters and booking a boarding for your cat is a breeze. Because hey, it should be.
about.zane-txt: Driving force behind the idea on the good days and crying force on the other ones
about.george-txt: Greek god of coding, the million dollar combo of stubbornness and patience
about.felix-txt: Felix tells us what to do when we don’t know what to do
about.acknowledgements-txt: None of this would be possible without <1>Craft Academy</1>. These people taught us to code and all things beyond that.

faq.p1: Our idea of KattBNB is a platform that lets cat sitters offer their services and cat owners book a sitter that is most convenient to them. Think that you could check your cat in with someone you can trust as easy you check yourself in a hotel! That’s what we are building. A full range service that allows you to not only find the right person to look after your cat but also handles the booking, payment, staying in touch and all the other stuff. So you don’t have to worry while you are away.
faq.p2: We are planning and working hard towards a release on spring 2020.
faq.p3: We are couple of friends passionate about cats and coding. We believe in solving problems that matter and having fun while at it. More <1>here</1>.
faq.p4-1: Good! If you have an idea how to improve our code, you are welcome to open a pull request <1>on GitHub</1>.
faq.p4-2: For any other suggestions and feedback, please use <1>this form</1> to get in touch with us.

contact.contact-p: Fill in this form to send us a message. We will get back to you as soon as we read it!
contact.error-msg: Your message was not sent. Please try again later.

ChangePassword.error-1: You should first visit the login page and click on the 'Forgot your password?' link
ChangePassword.error-2: Check that both fields are an exact match with each other and that they consist of at least 6 characters
ChangePassword.error-header: Password could not be changed because of following error(s):
ChangePassword.success-msg: You have succesfully changed your password! Please wait to be redirected.
ChangePassword.title: Change password
ChangePassword.instructions: Type in your new password twice in the fields below. Minimum requirement is 6 characters.

PasswordReset.error-header: Password reset could not be completed because of following error(s):
PasswordReset.title: Request password reset
PasswordReset.instructions: Fill in the email you registered with.

PasswordResetSuccess.title: Successful password reset request!
PasswordResetSuccess.p: You have successfully requested a password reset! To continue, please follow the instructions we have sent to your email. If you didn't receive our message in your inbox, please refer to our <1>FAQ</1> section.

Signup.error-header: User could not be registered because of following error(s):
Signup.title: Sign up
Signup.instructions: Password must be at least 6 characters in length. Email and Username must be unique.
Signup.captcha-label: Type the code you see above

SignupSuccess.title: Successful signup!
SignupSuccess.p: Welcome, you have successfully signed up for KattBNB! You will need to confirm your email address in the next 24 hours in order to log in and start using our services. To continue, please follow the instructions we have sent to your email. If you didn't receive our message in your inbox, please refer to our <1>FAQ</1> section.

You didn't input the captcha phrase corr: You didn't input the captcha phrase correctly, please try again!
